Surah -ul -Haq Bismillah -ur -Rehman -ur -Rahim is now the second couple.With this Surah, the truth that has become true is that the truth is true.What is the truth that is true?What is it?Both the nations of the Holy Prophet (peace be upon him) rejected the reader.Samood should be made to be resolved or any devil who goes away from the limits where it has happened.When they are lying, they were the biggest people of the country, as they were the trumpets of the Khujur, they were half as a half, as they were lying in the fiery, as if they were lying in the midst of the Khajur.The same thing was the case of the Prophet (peace and blessings of Allaah be upon him).So they disobeyed the Messenger of their Lord, the Falm of the Messenger of the Messenger of Allah, then they came to see them a pak -e -pakar, whose fierce fortune was gone.We had boarded you in a walking boat, ie the whole of humans, there were three sons at that time.They have three sons.They have to follow them.So that We may make it a reminder for you, Wait -ul -A'adnawa Ba'iyah, and that keep the ears that are protecting it with full protection.Now it is done.When the pigs are flown in the pig, one of the pigs is also very much worsened by the pig.And it was also translated into it, that it would be recovered that the mountains would be made to the mountains at this time.It would be as if the whole of the Barbara was at all.Samayuniya and then on that day, the Throne of your Lord will be raised.La uncle's uncle will not be hidden on this day.Fall my Amal Namah He would say, I thought I was sure that one day would come.He was a good deed.He was the person who would be given the name of the person to whom he would say, "I wish I had this book.After that, there would be no boss after that, my wealth and wealth did not work for me.The Sultania Sultania, my sovereignty, was in the world without the rhythm and the shakti was against.All ended.There will be no name.Bandaro, whose weigh is seventy -four, did not afford to be the greatness of Allah, the greatness of Allah, the Villas, who did not want to feed the poor and did not feed the poor, did not say to the poor.Apart from the wounds of the wounds, he will get some other food, or he will not eat any of the worshipers, but he is the one who was a sinner.It is the second of the Surah Al -Haqqqah of Surah Al -Haqqqa that it has a deep resemblance to the last verses of the Surah Al -Falaqat al -Fitr.Ta'alimun -ul -Azizim understands here that I swear by the time you see, and that you do not see the whole Qur'an, and I swear by the whole Qur'an.It is the Messenger of Allah and came from Jabir, then the Qul -Rasulin -Umayyan, but in fact, the Qalam of Allah, who then heard from Gabriel, said that Mohammed was the Gabriel, and it is the Messenger of Allah for the people who are blessed with the blessings of Muhammad (peace and blessings of Allaah be upon him).This is not the view of a shire that is rarely the view of the Shire, which you believe is the lack of a Qa'at -ul -Fitr.What you consider is that you have to descend from the Lord of all the worlds, who you were there.If this Prophet himself plans towards us by saying something, some verses, some verses himself, say something to us by saying something, and plan towards us by saying something with the appointment.We will cut off his neck again.We will do it with him.Do this with him.Bites were fuma bunkamam munnah َ h ُ din ْ It is a reminder that is a reminder for the sake of the devotees whose hearts have some piety.Some humanity is still alive.Some are moral senses.On denying, وَلَّهُ لَحَسْرَةٌ عَلَ الْكَافِرِينَ And it will come again at a time when it will become a source of humiliation and here it will become the kind of disbelievers.Come on, to bring it to others, then it will testify in your favor.He will take intercession and Burna will stand against you and come from the part of the process of procession.Al -Azizin, where the Surah event was over, the end of the Surah Surah event and the other is
